name: Star Frenzy
description:
Star Frenzy is a frantic 2D vector graphics shooter paying homage to the early 80's era games. You must do battle against the Forces of Infinity through multiple waves while racing against the clock. If time runs out, you lose a life and move on to an even more difficult world.

If you clear all of the world's timed levels and beat the bonus level, you will have a chance to dock with a power-up and claim your bonus points. Don't miss out on your chance for the subsequent levels hold enemies that become much faster, more numerous, and more aggressive with their attacks. Failure to dock with a power-up will lead to a far more punishing experience on the subsequent levels.

Features:
- Fast paced game play through multiple waves while racing against the clock
- Use one of three power-ups to make life easier clearing the levels
- Post your scores to the global leaderboards and see how you stack up against other Star Frenzy pilots
- Select one of four starting worlds
